text: The Governor-General of Belize is Her Majesty's representative in all matters about Belize. ==Governors-General of Belize, 1981-present == *Dame Elmira Minita Gordon, GCMG, GCVO (21 September 1981-17 November 1993) *Sir Colville Young, GCMG, MBE (17 November 1993-30 April 2021) *Froyla Tzalam (since 27 May 2021) *List of heads of state of Belize ==References== ==Other websites== *Georgetown University *
title: Governor-General of Belize
